text: Kaachiel gi makatino chiwne Jehova Nyasaye nyirombe abiriyo machwo maonge songa mahikgi en achiel, gi nyarwath matin kod imbe ariyo. Ginibed misango miwangʼo pep ni Jehova Nyasaye kaachiel gi misango mar cham gi misango miolo piny mondo obed misango miwangʼo pep madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova.
